1282620.name: 3x64 - Retro Minigame
1282620.description:
What would 3x64 look like if it released decades ago? Now you have a chance to find out with a retro remake of the original game, featuring the same gravity mechanic!

The retro minigame was released on April Fool's day in 2020, and now you can easily play it along with your classic game!

How to Play
You can launch the game manually from the game folder in your Steam directory. (click on the 3x64 game and select Properties -> Local Files tab -> Browse Local Files)
